justification: Shows some awareness that Team B chases upside and trusts consensus, but doesn’t engage B’s specific roster needs (TE injury, WR depth concerns) or bye/injury context. Perspective is shallow: little separation of A’s incentives from B’s. The offer is feasible yet misaligned with A’s ceiling/volume priorities (giving up a Tier 1 RB for two Tier 3 pieces) and misses an obvious TE angle for B. Rationale is generic and not evidence-based.
